Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running with delays at Harlem (O'Hare Branch) due to a mechanical problem.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running with delays at Harlem (O'Hare Branch) due to a mechanical problem.

Personnel are working to restore normal service. Allow extra travel time.
